1.0.NAME: Week 23 - Tech Tree
FEATURES: Tech Tree: The NutCorp Research Department has developed The Nut Horizon. A virtual environment with a huge explorable Tech Tree.
Earn Research Points by completing jobs. Spend points to unlock Equipment and Skills in the tree.
Everyone will start with 5 Research Points. You can exchange 250 Coins for 1 Research Point.
3 promo codes that reward Research Points hidden throughout the world.

New items: New backpacks (small, medium, large), Revolver, RPG, Hookshot, new melee weapons (Tree stick, Baseball Bat, Frying Pan, Pickaxe), Dynamite, Teleportation Grenade, Impulse Grenade, Cluster Grenade, Impact Grenade.
New Skills: + Backpack capacity, + Maximum Health, + Value of sold items, + Damage with guns/melee/explosives.
New Jobs & Rewards: 3 promo codes in new secret areas, daily jobs reward Research Points, new Weekly Jobs.
A new streamlined item purchase terminal.
You go ‚Äúrogue‚Äù only when killing another player instead of dealing damage
The heart gun uses your blood as fuel

This update introduces a new voice moderation system to help keep Animal Company a welcoming, fun, and safe place for everyone.
Players who repeatedly use offensive or harmful language may now be automatically muted, removed from a session, or banned.

1.28.NAME: Week 50 - R.A.M. CALIBRATION REQUIRED
FEATURES: R.A.M.: Canopy would like to thank everyone who assisted with the R.A.M. construction project.
The machine has been completed and now needs to be calibrated.
Input items to charge the machine. More valuable items provide more charge. Outcome not guarunteed.
Voice Moderation Details: Voice is only monitored in public lobbies. Punishments progressively scale. First offense is only a 5 minute mute.
Moderation Menu: New today is a moderation menu on the watch!
You can switch modes on the watch with the left stick.
While inside mod mode you can select players with a laser pointer. Once selected you can mute or report them.
Server hosts can kick players.
